Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition:
Eyewitness \Eye"wit`ness\, n. One who sees a thing done; one who has ocular view of anything. [1913 Webster]
We . . . were eyewitnesses of his majesty. --2 Pet. i. 16. [1913 Webster]
eyewitness n : a spectator who can describe what happened
